channel.title: DocFind Test Site
channel.description: Recent content on DocFind Test Site

item.title: The Future of Search
item.description: Search is Changing With WebAssembly, we can move search logic to the client. This reduces server load and protects privacy. Why DocFind? Rust-powered speed Compact index size Easy integration

item.title: Installation Guide
item.description: Installation This is a comprehensive guide on how to install the software. It includes steps for: Windows Linux macOS detailed Steps Run the installer and follow the on-screen instructions. The DocFind module handles the rest.

item.title: Hello DocFind
item.description: Welcome to DocFind This is a test page for the DocFind integration. It demonstrates how seamless the search experience can be. Features Fast WASM based Zero Config

item.title: Search Canary Antigravity
item.description: This is a test post to verify indexing. The magic word is Antigravity. Also searching for Supercalifragilistic. Banana Apple Orange.
